While waiting for lazy-loading to be native on many browsers, we can make it ourselves without a javascript framework. This example: - Autogenerates image sizes on the @Netlify ADN - Intersection observer get responsive images - 1k of JS - SSG helper tag https://t.co/S4vhvcEv4B https://t.co/dH5UllOPOr
